languages.text: "Я — Вольный Торговец, котор{mf|ый|ая} очень любит кровавые детали. Рассказывай!"
"I am the kind of Rogue Trader who likes to hear all the gory details. Tell me everything!"
languages.original_text: "Я — Вольный Торговец, котор{mf|ый|ая} очень любит кровавые детали. Рассказывай!"

traits.locale_text: "I am the kind of Rogue Trader who likes to hear all the gory details. Tell me everything!"

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は、血なまぐさい話は細部まで全部聞きたくなるタイプのローグトレーダーなんだ。さあ、全部話せ！」
languages.original_text: "I am the kind of Rogue Trader who likes to hear all the gory details. Tell me everything!"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は、血なまぐさい話は細部まで全部聞きたくなるタイプのローグトレーダーなんだ。さあ、全部話せ！」

languages.text: "Ich bin {mf|ein Freihändler, der|eine Freihändlerin, die} gerne blutige Einzelheiten hört. Erzählt mir alles."
languages.original_text: "I am the kind of Rogue Trader who likes to hear all the gory details. Tell me everything!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin {mf|ein Freihändler, der|eine Freihändlerin, die} gerne blutige Einzelheiten hört. Erzählt mir alles."

languages.text: « Je suis le genre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} qui aime les récits sanglants. Racontez-moi tout ! »
languages.original_text: "I am the kind of Rogue Trader who likes to hear all the gory details. Tell me everything!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le genre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} qui aime les récits sanglants. Racontez-moi tout ! »

languages.text: «Pues a {mf|este|esta} Comerciante Independiente le gustan los detalles escabrosos. ¡Cuéntemelo todo!».
languages.original_text: "I am the kind of Rogue Trader who likes to hear all the gory details. Tell me everything!"

traits.locale_text: «Pues a {mf|este|esta} Comerciante Independiente le gustan los detalles escabrosos. ¡Cuéntemelo todo!».

languages.text: “我是那种喜欢所有血腥细节的行商浪人，每个细节都给我说清楚！”
languages.original_text: "I am the kind of Rogue Trader who likes to hear all the gory details. Tell me everything!"

traits.locale_text: “我是那种喜欢所有血腥细节的行商浪人，每个细节都给我说清楚！”

languages.text: "Vahşeti tüm ayrıntılarıyla dinlemeyi seven bir Hür Tacir'im ben. Her şeyi anlat!"
languages.original_text: "I am the kind of Rogue Trader who likes to hear all the gory details. Tell me everything!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben, vahşeti tüm ayrıntılarıyla dinlemekten hoşlanan bir Hür Tacir'im. Her şeyi anlat!"
